alert.note: Alert for Gage; Jefferson; Lancaster; Saline (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 12:50AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lancaster, Jefferson, southeastern Saline and northwestern Gage Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1249 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles east of Gilead, or 6 miles west of Fairbury, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fairbury around 1255 AM CDT. Jansen around 100 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Plymouth, Swanton, De Witt, Wilber, Clatonia and Pickrell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
